gen:link.msg:message: `AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration` SHOULD be equal to + `Remuneration` - `IndividualMaximumRemuneration`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_Remuneration')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_Remuneration return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_IndividualMaximumRemuneration')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_IndividualMaximumRemuneration return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Remuneration` SHOULD be equal to + `RemunerationUnduePayments` - `UnduePayments`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_Remuneration')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_Remuneration return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_RemunerationUnduePayments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_RemunerationUnduePayments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_UnduePayments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfSupervisorySeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_UnduePayments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
